players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
You: "Alice is acting suspiciously and was seen near Diana's body last night."
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob next. He seemed suspicious during the discussion."
Bob: "I am innocent and have no idea who the mafioso is. I was just discussing with Alice last night, nothing suspicious."
You: "Alice's story about being near Diana's body last night doesn't add up. She was seen leaving the scene right before the discovery of the body."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
